courses.course_name: MATLAB 2018 new (formerly matlab) - The Complete Guide

course_details.description: The course consists of interactive lectures with students doing sample MATLAB problems in real time.
quick_view: Beginning to advanced MATLAB programming proficiency. This is *the only course* that develops intermediate and advanced programming skills.
Gain skills to solve challenging problems in MATLAB, as opposed to memorizing syntax rules.

courses.course_name: Advance Java Programming Create Web Application And Platforms!

course_details.description: How to organize data on arrays and connected lists by the primitive data classes and types
quick_view: Develop and utilize linear data structures, like queues and stacks, which are implemented with connected lists or arrays
Understand the basic process of OOP paradigm such as classes, polymorphism, inheritance, interfaces, and etc
How to write, compile, and run the basic Java applications
